juzs.text: Zdarny indeed bol believers
Kto bol reverent during ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat)
they avoid vain talk
they dat ich zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat)
they maintain ich chastity
Len s ich spouses those je rightfully ich robi they have sexual vztah; they nie bol blamed
Those transgress these limits bol transgressors
When it pojdem zaloha entrusted do them i mat rad any dohoda they robit they je trustworthy
they observe ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat) regularly
Such bol inheritors
They zdedit Raj wherein they abide forever
My created human bol z certain laskavy z mud
Subsequently my reproduced him tiny kvapka miesto lepsi chranit repository

Potom my developed kvapka into hanging (zarodok) potom developed hanging (zarodok) into bite-size (fetus) potom created bite-size (fetus) into bones potom pokryvka bones ani ryba ani rak. My thus produce new creature. Zehnat bol GOD lepsie Creator
Potom neskoro on, ona umrel
Potom Dni Vzkriesenie ona resurrected
My created ona 7 universes layers my som never unaware z single creature them
My send nadol sky zavlazit exact measure potom my store it ground Istota my let it escape
S it my produce for ona orchards z datum palms grapes all laskavy z ovocie various foods
I strom rodny do Sinai produces olej i mat rad relish eaters
Zivy Inventar zadovazit ona lekcia. My let ona pne (mlieko) z ich brucho ona derive inaksie benefits z them some z them ona pouzivat for food
On them on ships ona ride
My sent Noah jeho ludia saying O moj ludia kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous
leaders disbelieved jeho ludia said This bol ziaden inak than human ona chudoba zisk prominence ona. Had GOD willed He sent angels. My never heard anything this our predok
He len clovek ist crazy Iba ignorovat him for awhile
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory they disbelieved mna

My potom inspirovat him Robit watercraft our watchful oci v accordance s our inspiracia! When our command pojdem atmosphere boils up put it pair z kazdy laskavy (z tvoj domesticated zviera) tvoj rodina except those condemned doomed Nie speak do Mna on behalf z those transgressed they drowned
Once ona zaplatit dohromady those bol ona watercraft ona say ‘Chvalit GOD for saving us z zly ludia
say ‘Moj Lord let mna disembark zehnat location; Ona je dobre zachranca
These zadovazit sufficient proofs ona! My istota put ona test
Subsequently my zriadit iny generation after them
My sent do them posol z them saying Ona kult GOD Ona nie have inak god Him. Ona nie bol righteous

leaders jeho ludia disbelieved zamietnut idea Hereafter -although my zadovazit for them generously v this zivot -said This bol ziaden inak than human bol ona! He jestn z co ona jestn pne mat rad ona pne
If ona obey human bol ona potom ona bol skutocne losers
he promise ona ona umrel turn into dust bones ona pod znova
Nemozne nemozne indeed je co promised ona
My len zit this zivot -My zit umrel! -A my never resurrected
He bol iba clovek fabricated laicky attributed them GOD My never verit him
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory they disbelieved mna
He said Skoro they bol sorry
retribution struck them equitably thus my turned them zrucaniny. Zlomyselny ludia zdochnut
Subsequently my zriadit inak generations them
Ziaden obec zaloha its predetermined fate nor zdrzat it
Potom my sent our posol v succession. Kazdy cas posol ist jeho obec they disbelieved him. Consequently my annihilated them 1 inaksie robit them history! Ludia disbelieved zdochnut
Potom my sent Moses jeho brat Aaron our revelations profound proof
Do Pharaoh jeho elders they turned arrogant! They bol oppressive ludia
They said my verit 2 clovek whose ludia je our slaves
They zamietnut 2 a consequently they annihilated
My dat Moses scripture they guided
My robit syn Mary jeho matka znamenie my dat them refuge mesa food pne
O ona posol jestn dobry provisions zavodny righteousness! Ja je fully aware z everything ona robit
Such bol tvoj congregation -1 congregation -Ja bol tvoj Lord ona reverence Mna
they tore into disputing factions; each party happy co they have
Therefore iba lavy them ich zmatok for awhile
Robit they myslienka since my zadovazit them peniaze dieta
My lejak them blessings? Indeed they nie have idea
Iste those bol reverently conscious z ich Lord
Kto verit v revelations ich Lord
A kto never set any idols ich Lord
Mat Rad they dat ich laska k bliznemu ich srdce bol fully reverent. they recognize lenze they zvolat ich Lord
They bol eager robit righteous robota; they compete do robit them
My never burden any soul its vyznam my keep rekord utters truth. Ziaden 1 suffer injustice
Ich zmyslanie bol oblivious do this they commit robota robi nie zhodny this; ich robota bol zly
Potom when my requite ich leaders retribution they complain
Nie complain teraz; ona dat all pomoc z us
Moj proofs presented ona ona turned tvoj heels
Ona je i arrogant accept them ona defiantly disregarded them
Why they nie zrkadlit this scripture? they nie realize ze they robit received nieco have never attained ich predok
they zlyhat recognize ich posol? this they je disregarding him
they decided ze he Have bol crazy Indeed he brought truth them vela z them hate truth
Indeed if truth zhodny ich zelat there bol chaos heavens zem; everything them zhnity! My dat them ich proof they disregarding ich proof
Ona ziadat them wage Tvoj Lord's wage bol daleko lepsie. He je lepsie Provider
vela assuredly ona inviting them straight chodnicek
Those disbelieve Hereafter iste deviate na pravo chodnicek
Vecer when my lejak them s zlutovanie, relieved ich problems they plunged deeper transgression zotrvat omyl
Vecer when my afflicted them retribution they never turned ich Lord imploring
Subsequently when my requited them severe retribution they incurred they lak
He je 1 kto granted ona hearing eyesight inteligencia! Zriedka bol ona appreciative
He je Jeden zriadit ona zem a Him ona zvolat
He bol Jeden controls zivot smrt He bol 1 kto alternates night dni. Ona nie chapat
They said co ich predok said
They said After my umrel become dust bones my get resurrected
Such promises dat us our rodicia v the minuly. These je ziaden inak than tales z minuly
Say "Do koho belongs zem everyone it if ona zauzlit
They say "Do GOD Say potom ona nie berie heed
Say Kto bol Lord z 7 universes; Lord velka dominion
They say GOD Say potom ona nie turn righteous
Say Do whose hand je all sovereignty all things He iba jeden zadovazit pomoc needs nie pomoc ona je zauzlit
They say GOD Say Kde will ona ist zlo
My dat them truth chvila they bol liars
GOD never begotten SYN. Nor bol there vzdy any inak god Him. Inak each god declared independence jeho creations they competed each inak for dominance! GOD glorified DALEKO ICH REKLAMOVAT
Knower z all secrets declarations; He exalted daleko having partner
Say Moj Lord Ona show mna (retribution) they incurred
Moj Lord let mna nie je jeden z transgressing ludia
Do show ona (retribution) my rezervovat them je nieco my easily robit
Therefore counter ich zly robota laskavost; my bol fully aware z ich reklamovat
Say Moj Lord ja seek refuge Ona z whispers devils
Ja seek refuge v Ona moj Lord lest they pojdem mna
When smrt pojdem 1 z them he says Moj Lord send mna
Ja potom zavodny righteousness everything ja lavy. Nie true This bol false reklamovat he robit. barrier separate jeho soul this world vzkriesenie
When roh nie blown vztah them exist ze dni nor will they care 1 iny
Mat rad for those weights bol heavy they bol winners
Those weights bol kypry je jeden lost ich souls; they abide Hell forever
Zapalit overwhelm ich faces they posledny miserably therein
Nie bol Moj revelations recited ona ona kept zamietnut them
They say Our Lord our wickedness overwhelmed us my zaludnit ist astray
(Our Lord berie us out z this; if my spatny listok our stara chovanie) potom my bol skutocne zlomyselny
He say Abide therein humiliated nie speak do Mna
Zoskupit Moj servants pouzivat say ‘Our Lord my verit so forgive us lejak us s zlutovanie! Z all merciful jeden Ona bol the Vela Merciful
Ona mocked ridiculed them extent ze ona zabudnut Mna! Ona pouzivat laugh them
Ja rewarded them dnes chrbat ich steadfastness robit them winners
He said "Ako long ona posledny zem? Ako vela rocnik
They said My posledny dni part z dni! Ziadat those pocitat
He said skutocne ona zostat brief interim ona len zauzlit
Ona myslienka my Robit created ona v vain ona nie bol spatny listok us
exalted bol GOD true Sovereign There nie bol inak god Him; the Vela Honorable Lord possessor all authority
Ktokolvek idolizes GOD any inaksie god any laskavy z proof reckoning zvysok jeho Lord disbelievers never succeed
Say Moj Lord lejak us forgiveness zlutovanie! Z all merciful jeden Ona bol the Vela Merciful
sura my sent nadol my decreed zakon. My revealed zretelny revelations ze ona berie heed
adulteress adulterer ona whip each z them sto lashes Nie kymacanie by zlutovanie beriem GOD's zakon if ona truly verit v GOD Posledny Dni! let zoskupit believers svedok ich penalty
adulterer koniec vydana adulteress idol worshiper adulteress koniec vydana adulterer idol worshiper! This zakazat believers
Those zalovat zenaty zensky adultery potom zlyhat produce 4 svedok ona whip them 80 lashes nie accept any testimony z them; they bol zlomyselny
they repent afterwards reform potom GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Mat rad for those zalovat ich own spouses any inaksie svedok potom testimony accepted he swears GOD 4 cas he telling truth
oath bol incur GOD's condemnation him he laicky
Ona considered innocent ona swears GOD 4 lehota he bol liar
oath incur GOD's zloba ju he telling truth
This bol GOD's grace zlutovanie ona! GOD bol Redeemer Wise

gang ona produced velky laicky Nie myslienka it bol zly ona; radsej it bol dobry for ona. Zatial each jeden z them zarabat jeho share guilt. Mat rad for 1 kto zasvatit whole incident he incurred hrozny retribution
When ona heard it verit clovek verit zensky had lepsi thoughts themselves said This bol obviously velky laicky
Len they produced 4 svedok (ona verit them)! they zlyhat produce svedok potom they bol GOD liars
If it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie v this world Hereafter ona suffered velka retribution this incident
Ona fabricated it tvoj own jazyk zvysok z ona repeated it tvoj usta without proof Ona myslienka bol simple when it bol GOD gross
When ona heard it ona said My nie repeat this. Glory bol Ona. This bol gross falsehood
GOD admonishes ONA ZE ONA never ROBIT it ZNOVA ONA bol believers
GOD thus explains revelations ONA. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
Those laska see immorality spread believers incurred painful retribution v this zivot Hereafter GOD zauzlit, CHVILA ONA NIE ZAUZLIT
GOD LEJAK ONA JEHO grace ZLUTOVANIE! GOD bol LASKAVY towards believers Merciful

O ona verit nie nasledovat steps Satan! Ktokolvek nasledovat steps Satan zauzlit lenze he zastanca zly zverak. If it je for GOD's grace ona Jeho zlutovanie ziaden z ona purified GOD purifies whomever He wills. GOD bol Hearer Knower

Those among ona zehnat resources wealth bol charitable towards ich vztazny chudobny those immigrated GOD They treat them laskavo znasanlivost; ona nie laska attain GOD's forgiveness? GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Iste those falsely zalovat zenaty zensky bol zbozny believers incurred condemnation v this zivot Hereafter they incurred horrendous retribution
Dni pojdem when ich own jazyk hands nohy bear svedok everything they robit
On dni GOD will requite them fully for ich robota they will zalozit out lenze GOD bol Truth
Zly zensky zly clovek zly clovek zly zensky dobry zensky dobry clovek dobry clovek dobry zensky. The latter bol innocent z such accusations. They attained forgiveness generous reward
O ona verit nie zapisat domov inak than yours permission z ich inhabitants pozdravy them! This je lepsie ona ze ona berie heed
Ona zalozit ziaden 1 them nie zapisat them ona ziskat permission! Ona told Ist ona ist This bol purer for ona. GOD JE fully aware z everything ONA ROBIT
Ona nie commit omyl zapisat uninhabited domov wherein there bol nieco belongs do ona! GOD zauzlit everything ONA reveal everything ONA ZATAJIT
(Tell verit clovek they subdue ich oci nie stare zensky) maintain ich chastity! This bol purer for them. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything they ROBIT

A tell verit zensky subdue ich oci maintain ich chastity! They nie reveal any parts z ich zbor lenze kto bol necessary! They pokryvka ich chests nie relax this zakonnik presence ich muz ich otca otca ich muz ich syn syn ich muz ich brat syn ich brat syn ich sestra inak zensky muzsky servants zriadenec sexual drive nullified dieta nie zastihnut puberty. They nie strike ich nohy when they chodza v poradie shake reveal certain details ich zbor! All z ona repent GOD O ona believers ze ona succeed
Ona encourage those z ona bol single get zenaty! They vydana righteous among tvoj muzsky zenska servants they bol chudobny. GOD will enrich them JEHO grace GOD bol Bounteous Knower

Those nie afford get zenaty maintain morality GOD zadovazit for them z Jeho grace Those among tvoj servants zelat volny v poradie vydana ona grant them ich zelat once ona realize lenze they bol honest Dat them GOD's peniaze He bestowed ona. Ona nie force tvoj girls commit prostitution seeking latka this world they zelat je chaste Ktokolvek forces them potom GOD seeing they forced bol Forgiver Merciful
My revealed ona clarifying revelations vzor minuly generations enlightenment for the righteous

GOD bol LAHKY Z heavens ZEM. allegory Jeho lahky bol lenze z concave zrkadlo lampa miesto glass container. glass container bol chapavy pearl-like star Kurivo thereof zasoba zehnat oil-producing strom ze bol neither eastern nor zapadny! Its olej je skoro self-radiating; nie zapalit ignite it Kypry upon lahky! GOD guides JEHO LAHKY whoever wills guided GOD thus cites parables LUDIA. GOD bol fully aware z all things
God's guidance zalozit dom exalted GOD Jeho vola sa commemorated therein! Glorifying Him therein dni i night
Ludia nie zmateny by zalezitost zivnost commemorating GOD they observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) they bol conscious z dni when zmyslanie oci horrified
GOD will ISTOTA reward them ICH DOBRY ROBOTA LEJAK them JEHO grace GOD zadovazit for whomever He wills limits

Mat rad for those disbelieve ich robota bol mirage zbehnut. thirsty clovek myslienka it bol zavlazit! when he zastihnut it he zalozit it bol nothing he zalozit GOD there radsej requite him fully jeho robota. GOD bol the vela ZDATNY reckoner
Iny allegory bol z je total darkness violent ocean kyvat kyvat inak thick fog Darkness darkness -he looked jeho own hand he ledva see it Whomever GOD zbavit z kypry nie have kypry
Ona nie realize ze everyone heavens zem glorifies GOD vecer birds mat rad they letiet column? Each zauzlit its prayer its glorification. GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT
Do GOD belongs sovereignty z heavens zem do GOD bol zaverecny destiny

Ona nie realize lenze GOD drives clouds robit potom zozbierat them dohromady potom piles them on each inak, potom ona see dazo pojdem out z them? He sends sky loads snow pokryvka whomever He wills chvila diverting it z whomever He wills! brightness snow skoro blinds oci
GOD controls night DNI. This bol lekcia those possess oci
GOD created kazdy zivy creature z zavlazit! Some z them chodit ich brucho some chodit 2 noha some chodza 4. GOD creates whatever He wills. GOD bol Omnipotent
My sent ona clarifying revelations potom GOD guides whoever wills guided straight chodnicek
They say My verit v GOD posol my obey potom some z them slide chrbat afterwards! These je believers
When they invited GOD Jeho posol judge them some z them zvratit
if judgment bol ich favor they readily accept it
bol there disease ich srdce? Je they doubtful? Je they afraid lenze GOD Jeho posol treat them unfairly? Skutocne bol they bol unjust
Iba utterance believers whenever invited do GOD Jeho posol judge ich affairs je say My hear my obey These bol winners
Those obey GOD Jeho posol reverence GOD observe Him these bol triumphant jeden
They swear GOD solemnly ona commanded them mobilize they mobilize! Say nie swear. Obedience bol zavaznost. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
Say Obey GOD obey posol. they refuse potom he bol zodpovedny jeho zavaznost ona bol zodpovedny for tvoj zavaznost. Ona obey him ona guided Chodidlo clo posol bol deliver (odkaz)

GOD promises those ONA verit lead righteous ZIVOT ZE He ROBIT them sovereigns ZEM mat rad He ROBIT for those before them A ZRIADIT for them NABOZENSTVO He ZVOLIT SI them ZASTUPID peace ZARUKA them v miesto Z fear All this because they kult Mna alone they never set any idols Mna. Those disbelieve this bol the truly zlomyselny
Ona observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) obey posol ze ona attain zlutovanie
Nie myslienka those disbelieve vzdy get it Ich zaverecny abode bol Hell; co chudobny destiny

(O ona verit permission ziadost tvoj servants dieta nie attained puberty zapisat tvoj izba)! This bol je robi v 3 instances -Dawn Prayer noon when ona zmenit tvoj clothes zvysok Night Prayer. These je 3 private lehota ona. Do inaksie cas nie bol zlo ona them mingle 1 iny GOD thus clarifies revelations ONA. GOD bol Omniscient Wise

(Once dieta zastihnut puberty they ziadat permission before zapisat) mat rad those became dospely them ziadat permission before zapisat)! GOD thus clarifies JEHO revelations ONA. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
elderly zensky nie expect get zenaty commit nothing zlo by relaxing ich saty zakonnik zadovazit they nie reveal i vela z ich zbor! maintain modesty je lepsie them. GOD bol Hearer Knower

blind nie bol blamed crippled nie bol blamed nor handicapped blamed iba mat rad ona nie bol blamed for jestn tvoj domov domov tvoj otca domov tvoj matka domov tvoj brat domov tvoj sestra domov tvoj otca brat domov tvoj otca sestra domov tvoj matka brat domov tvoj matka sestra domov belong do ona ona possess ich kluc domov tvoj znamy! Ona commit nothing zlo jestn dohromady mat rad individuum! When ona zapisat any domov ona greet each inak pozdravy z GOD zehnat a dobry. GOD thus explains revelations ONA ONA CHAPAT

true believers bol those verit v GOD Jeho posol a when they bol him obec schodza they robi nie lavy him permission! Those ziadat permission bol jeden verit v GOD Jeho posol. they ziadat tvoj permission v poradie tend do some z ich affairs ona grant permission whomever ona zelat ziadat GOD forgive them! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

Nie treat posol ziadost ona treat each others' ziadost! GOD JE fully aware z those among ONA ZALOVAT away pouzivat flimsy excuses Let them beware -those disobey jeho zakazka -for disaster strike them severe retribution
Absolutely do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! He fully zauzlit kazdy condition ona bol do. Dni ona spatny listok Him He informovat them z everything they robit. GOD bol fully aware z all things
Zehnat je 1 revealed Statute Kniha Jeho servant he serve warner the whole world
do koho belongs all sovereignty z heavens zem! He never had syn nor robit He have any partners sovereignty! He created everything exact measure He precisely zamyslat everything
lenze they set beside Him gods nie create anything -they created -Kto nie possess power vecer harm benefit nor robit they possess any power control zivot smrt vzkriesenie
Those disbelieved said This bol fabrication he produced pomoc some inaksie zaludnit. They uttered blasphemy falsehood
They i said Tales z minuly he pisat they dictated him dni i night
Say This revealed the Jeden zauzlit Secret heavens zem! He Forgiving Merciful
A they said "Ako pod this posol jestn food chodza markets If len angel pod him serve him preacher
Al If len treasure dat him! Al len he possess orchard z kto he jestn! transgressors i said Ona nasledovat bewitched clovek
Note ako they vola sa ona all laskavy z vola sa a ako this led them astray never zalozit ich way zadny
Zehnat je 1 viem He wills dat ona vela lepsie than ich ziadat! -Zahrada flowing streams vela rezidencia
Skutocne they disbelieved Hodiny (Dni Vzkriesenie) my chystat those disbelieve Hodiny flaming Hell
When it sees them z afar they hear its zurivost fuming
A when they thrown it narrow miesto all puta they declare ich remorse
Ona nie declare iba single remorse ze dni; ona suffer velka zvazok remorses
Say Je this lepsie eternal Raj ze promised for the righteous? It bol ich lepsi zasluzit si reward lepsi zasluzit si destiny
They get anything they zelat therein forever This bol tvoj Lord's irrevocable promise
Dni when He zvolat them dohromady idols they set GOD He had say robit ona zmylit these servants z Bana Have they ist astray on ich own
They say Ona glorified nie bol riadne us set any lords Ona. Ona allowed them enjoy dohromady ich rodicia! Consequently they disregarded odkaz thus became zlomyselny ludia

They disbelieved odkaz ona dat them consequently ona viem neither chranit them z retribution they incurred nor mozem ona pomoc them v any way Ktokolvek among ona commits zly my commit him severe retribution
My nie send any posol ona nie jestn food chodza markets My thus test ona by each inak; ona steadfastly persevere Tvoj Lord bol Seer
